archive.title: Chat Archive
archive.hint: Open the chat archive in a new window.

chatBar.title: Show Chat Bar
chatBar.hint: Show the "Speaking As" bar above the chat box.

loadLastArchive.title: Auto-Load Last Archive
loadLastArchive.hint: Automatically load the last chat archive when opening the chat archive window.

speakerMode.title: Speaker Mode
speakerMode.hint: Changes the default behavior of your chat messages and who you speak as. The default behavior is to speak as your currently controlled token, or assigned character. The /ooc command overrides this behavior on a per-message basis.

archive.title: Chat Archive
archive.cantDelete: Due to security reasons, FoundryVTT does not allow deleting files from the server. <p/> You have to manually go to the {path} and delete the archive!
